ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] effectiveDateRange with data type Time Interval
An interval of time specifying the period during which the Medicare enrollment is in effect, if such time limit is applicable and known.

Contains exactly one [1..1] medicareId with data type Id
An identifier, assigned by the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS), to identify the Provider.

Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
Indicates the current state of Medicare enrollment. The possible values are defined in the HL7 Role state-transition model.

Contains exactly one [1..1] status with data type Code
Indicates the current state of Medicare enrollment. The possible values are defined in the HL7 Role state-transition model.
